summary: A NOISE WAS HEARD UNDER THE HOOD OF THE VEHICLE.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALERSHIP WHICH COULD NOT DETERMINE THE PROBLEM AT THAT TIME.   THE NOISE WAS HEARD AGAIN.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALERSHIP WHICH REPLACED THE TIMING BELT TENSIONER AND THE OIL PUMP.  PLEASE PROVIDE DETAILS.  *AK
